tvdb: Jamal and Alison find Valerie working at the Recovery Room.  Valerie makes nice to Alison in front of Jamal, but when they're alone together, she declares she'll fight for Jamal.  Lucy and Jack suspect Caleb is behind their romantic troubles, as they drown their sorrows together.  Anne-Marie warns Eve that she and Daniel are in danger from Ian and Anne-Marie's story sounds eerily familiar to Eve.  A frightened Eve tells Ian to leave their loft.  Karen's energy level surprises Frank, who wonders if she's back on drugs.  Lucy bumps into Ian in the hotel while Jack bumps into Anne-Marie.  A robber holds up the Recovery Room.
